title: I can't restore bookmarks after refreshing Firefox. It says it can't process the backup file. When I try to restore using hte saved HTML document, it won't come up in the file window.
content: When I try to restore my bookmarks, it says it can't process the backup file. When I try to restore using the saved HTML document, it won't come up in the file window.
creator: Ascender

title: Applications have been blocked from accessing graphics hardware
content: Ever since the last Firefox update, the app has been crashing and giving me this message: "Applications have been blocked from accessing graphics hardware". Anybody know what is causing this?
creator: robadelman10

title: ABOUT:LOGINS
content:
I did a FIREFOX reset.

All my Logins are missing. I've never seen this occur.

FIREFOX: 103.0.2 64bit

THIS IS A HUGE LOSS.

Help would be greatly appreciated.

Bill Prusak bpru@usa.net
creator: bpru

title: How to stop firefox automaticly opening ctrl+f - this happening any time i press any key
content: When typing any letter - ctrl+f popup opens and then starts searching - I have to press escape to get out but then this starts happening again for any window I have tried changing config to disable this but that does not work ? is this a malware - that cannot be removed ?
creator: heyamig01

title: Cannot log in to bank site - it says I need a newer browser
content: When I go to my bank's login site, I get a message saying that I need a newer browser. I have the latest version of Firefox, and I used to be able to log in just fine, but I recently reset my browser and I seem to have lost some settings. I have tried adding an exception for this site's cookies in Settings, and I've also tried turning off enhanced tracker, but the site still doesn't work. Is there a way to tell what is broken and then fix it? Thank you.
creator: MikeN23

title: Can’t use search engines
content: When I try to do a Google search, I get the potential security risk message. I have set it to no proxy, cleared the cache and cookies, created a new profile, ran my antivirus and a few other things that I can’t remember. I’m on Windows 7. I get the same message for all search engines. I actually was able to do a successful search a few times over the last week, but I couldn’t click and get to any site from the results.
creator: amysherrick
